zones.name: Kaitaia
zones.notes: Subtropical Far North; frosts extremely rare.

zones.name: Kerikeri
zones.notes: Warm humid climate; rare frost inland only.

zones.name: Whangārei
zones.notes: Mild coastal winters, brief inland frost season.

zones.name: Auckland
zones.notes: Frosts uncommon except rural outskirts.

zones.name: Pukekohe
zones.notes: Occasional light frost in low-lying areas.

zones.name: Thames / Coromandel
zones.notes: Mild winters; frost mainly inland valleys.

zones.name: Hamilton / Waikato
zones.notes: Frequent inland frost; sheltered basins cold.

zones.name: Tauranga / Bay of Plenty
zones.notes: Coastal, very mild frost season.

zones.name: Rotorua
zones.notes: Frequent frosts due to elevation.

zones.name: Taupō
zones.notes: High-altitude basin; long frost season.

zones.name: Gisborne
zones.notes: Dry sunny region; mild frost inland.

zones.name: Napier / Hawke’s Bay
zones.notes: Dry climate, light frost inland plains.

zones.name: Hastings
zones.notes: Frequent frosts in orchard valleys.

zones.name: New Plymouth / Taranaki
zones.notes: Coastal mild climate, rare frosts.

zones.name: Whanganui
zones.notes: Occasional light frost inland only.

zones.name: Palmerston North / Manawatū
zones.notes: Moderate frost season inland valleys.

zones.name: Levin / Horowhenua
zones.notes: Short frost period, coastal influence.

zones.name: Masterton / Wairarapa
zones.notes: Frequent frosts, sheltered basin climate.

zones.name: Wellington
zones.notes: Windy coastal climate; frost rare except Hutt Valley.

zones.name: Nelson
zones.notes: Sunny, dry region; inland frost common.

zones.name: Blenheim / Marlborough
zones.notes: Cold winters, frequent vineyard frosts.

zones.name: Westport
zones.notes: Mild west coast, few frost days.

zones.name: Greymouth
zones.notes: High rainfall, brief frost windows.

zones.name: Hokitika
zones.notes: Cool mornings, light frost inland.

zones.name: Christchurch / Canterbury Plains
zones.notes: Long frost season, dry cold air.

zones.name: Ashburton
zones.notes: Frequent frosts; inland plains.

zones.name: Timaru
zones.notes: Regular frost, sheltered coastal plain.

zones.name: Oamaru
zones.notes: Moderate frost season; coastal influence reduces severity.

zones.name: Dunedin
zones.notes: Long cool winter; frost frequent inland suburbs.

zones.name: Invercargill / Southland
zones.notes: Severe frosts common; long cold winter.

zones.name: Queenstown / Central Otago
zones.notes: Very long frost season, alpine basin climate.
